DOC.brief_summary: The effect Internet-delivered Cognitive Behavior Therapy ( ICBT ) adolescent ( 12 17 year ) Obsessive-Compulsive Disorder study . Participants randomize either ICBT no-treatment condition . We expect ICBT superior no-treatment condition .
DOC.brief_title: Internet-delivered CBT Adolescents With OCD : A Randomized Controlled Study
DOC.detailed_description: The primary objective study test efficacy Internet-delivered cognitive behavior therapy ( ICBT ) adolescent ( 12 - 17 year ) OCD . We aim conduct randomize controlled study N = 66 participant . Participants randomly assign ICBT wait list condition , either last 12 week . The primary outcome measure Children 's Yale-Brown Obsessive Compulsive Scale ( CY-BOCS ) . Study participant follow 3 12 month treatment . ICBT expect yield significantly well symptom reduction wait list condition .
